select
from cloth_info 1=1
and cloth_name like '%${t.clothName}%'
and order_name like '%${t.orderName}%'
and mark like '%${t.mark}%'
and id=#{t.id}
order by id desc

from cloth_info
cloth_name like '%${t}%' or pinyin like '%${t}%'

from cloth_info order by id desc
